item.title: My First Post
item.description: Hi, This is my first post. I’m computer and communication engineering student at INSA Toulouse. I’m interested in programming in : Java , C , Go lang and Javascript… Also, I’m interested in Android development , Web apps, and Security DevOps, and Linux Administration. I would like to use this blog to share information about computer science. Android development My Future posts will be related to these subjects. My tutorials will be focused on simplifying and coding android applications efficiently.
